recipe.title: Simple Honey Syrup Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: In a small saucepan, combine the water and honey. Bring to a boil over medium heat, and boil for about 3 minutes until slightly reduced. Remove the pan from the heat and let cool completely.
The simple honey syrup will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 months.
